title: 5 Bedroom 2 Bath, $3000.00 mnthly
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   2 Story recently remodeled 2500 sq ft 5 bedrooms 2 fullsize bathrooms . Jacuzzi tub, Pool Table and  Stainless steel appliances and all new light fixtures and ceiling fans laundry on main level.  Huge studio bedroom with own entrance and outside balcony overlooking newly developed hessville park  and Dowling Park including Purdue Northwest Sports Complex. Huge yard and side yard and within walking distance of 3 parks.
